alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 25 at 9:30PM EST until January 26 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT.. Mixed precipitation. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oneida county. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... A light wintry mix will change back to lake effect snow showers around daybreak Thursday, continuing through the day.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
